text: kavurunva allah rju margayehi ætulu karanneda, ovunma rju margaya at kara gannaha. kavurunva (allah) væradi margayehi athæra damannoda, evænnanta ohu hæra udav karannan kisiveku oba nodakinnehiya. tavada viniscaya dinadi ovunva andhayin vasayenda, goluvan vasayenda, bihiran vasayenda, (pat kara) ovun tamange munin væti badagamin ennata (salasva), ovunva ekarasi karannemu. ovun rændi sitina sthanaya nirayayi. ovunta api (nirayehi adhika usanatvaya) adu vana sæma vitama, dalu la dævena se nævatat adhika karannemu
